Package com.hyprmx.android.sdk

Interface Summary
HyprMXHelper.HyprMXListener Interface for clients to implement to receive notification when offers are completed or cancelled by the user.
 

Class Summary
HyprMXActivity An abstract base class for clients to subclass to easily manage the offer lifecycle and receive callbacks at appropriate times.
HyprMXBanner Represents a banner that fits the width of the provided space in whatever layout it's inserted that can display ad content as received from the HyprMX API.
HyprMXButton Represents a relatively small button that can display ad content as received from the HyprMX API.
HyprMXHelper Provides the public interface to the ad request API for performing all HyprMX ad-related functions.
HyprMXPresentation Provides a way to display HyprMX ads without displaying one of the pre-canned UI methods.
 

Enum Summary
HyprMXButton.ButtonSize  
HyprMXHelper.HyprMXPriority The priority at which HyprMX worker threads should execute.
